questions.q1: How do I add a new meter?
questions.a1: Tap the + button on the meters screen and fill in the required details including location and client information.
questions.q2: Can I take a photo of my meter reading?
questions.a2: Yes, our app includes a camera feature with guided reading assistant to help you capture accurate readings.
questions.a3: Bills are calculated based on the difference between current and previous readings, multiplied by the price per kWh you've set for each meter.
questions.q4: Does the app support multiple languages?
questions.a4: Yes, the app currently supports English and French with more languages coming soon.
questions.a5: Yes, you can export bills as PDF documents and share them via email or other apps on your device.
